title: Episode 1 — The Power of Sisterhood
author: Janelle Brooks
summary: In the first episode, Janelle explores how women uplift each other through friendship and empathy. Real listeners share what sisterhood means to them in times of challenge and celebration.

title: Episode 2 — When We Speak Our Truth
author: Naomi Fields
summary: Naomi sits down with guests who found the courage to tell their stories—about love, work, and self-worth. Together they reflect on how honesty transforms relationships and personal growth.

title: Episode 3 — Boundaries and Balance
author: Amira Chen
summary: Setting boundaries can be an act of love. Amira shares practical reflections on how to protect energy, build respect, and say 'no' without guilt.

title: Episode 4 — The Healing Power of Tears
author: Sofia Ramos
summary: Sofia opens a heartfelt discussion about grief, emotional release, and how crying can become a doorway to strength rather than weakness.

title: Episode 5 — Unlearning Perfection
author: Leila Johnson
summary: Leila and her guest unpack society's obsession with being 'perfect'—at work, in love, and online. Together, they explore what freedom looks like when we let go of impossible standards.

title: Episode 6 — The Art of Listening
author: Priya Singh
summary: Priya invites women from around the world to share stories of being truly heard. Through laughter and tears, they celebrate the deep human connection born from genuine listening.

title: Episode 7 — The Joy of Starting Over
author: Isabella Cruz
summary: Life after endings. Isabella reflects on reinvention, resilience, and the surprising beauty of new beginnings after heartbreak or change.

title: Episode 8 — Letters to Our Younger Selves
author: Nadia El-Sayed
summary: Nadia reads letters from women of all ages—offering wisdom, forgiveness, and compassion to their younger selves. A tender episode about growing up and growing kinder.

title: Episode 9 — The Beauty of Being Alone
author: Caroline Moore
summary: Solitude doesn't have to mean loneliness. Caroline explores the peaceful side of spending time with oneself and how solitude helps us reconnect with our inner voice.

title: Episode 10 — Her Voice, Her Legacy
author: Janelle Brooks
summary: In the finale, Janelle revisits her favorite listener moments from the season. A celebration of women's voices and the lasting echoes of shared stories.
